column5: Visa required except for Passengers with a valid visa issued by a Schengen Member State for a maximum stay of 90 days.
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 7 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states
Visa not required for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the European Union member states
Visa not required for holders of normal Armenian passports endorsed For Public Affairs.

Visa required except for Passengers with a multiple-entry business or tourist visa issued by Canada Iceland Liechtenstein Norway Switzerland or an EU Member State
Visa required except for Passengers with a valid visa issued by Bulgaria Canada Croatia Cyprus Ireland (Rep.) Romania USA United Kingdom or a Schengen Member State

Visa required except for Passengers with a valid visa issued by Canada Japan USA United Kingdom or a Schengen Member State for a maximum stay of 180 days.
Visa not required for 30 days for holders of a visa issued by Ireland United States United Kingdom or a Schengen Area member state.
